languages.text:
Медный шепот черпает силу Эсхатоса, получая +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.
Паскаль получает +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} для следующей атаки против нее. Если атака Паскаля прошла успешно, эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 INT and +50% damage, but Pasqal also gains +10% critical hit chance against her for his next attack. If Pasqal's attack hits Brasswhisper, this effect removes.

languages.text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.
languages.original_text:
Медный шепот черпает силу Эсхатоса, получая +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 3 раз.
Паскаль получает +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} для следующей атаки против нее. Если атака Паскаля прошла успешно, эффект снимается.

traits.locale_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 INT and +50% damage. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical hit chance against her on his next successful attack. Whet Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

languages.text:
Susurro de latón utiliza el poder de Eschatos. Gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
Pasqal también gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra ella en su próximo impacto. Cuando Pasqal impacta a Susurro de latón, pierde todas las acumulaciones de este efecto.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Susurro de latón utiliza el poder de Eschatos. Gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} y +50 % de daño. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
Pasqal también gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra ella en su próximo impacto. Cuando Pasqal {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a Susurro de latón, pierde todas las acumulaciones de este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}.

languages.text:
铜语汲取了终焉审判的力量。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。最多叠加3层。
帕斯卡下次命中铜语时，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率提高10%。当帕斯卡命中铜语时，铜语失去所有效果层数。
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text:
铜语汲取了终焉审判的力量。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点，造成的伤害提高50%。最多叠加3层。
帕斯卡下次命中铜语时，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高10%。当帕斯卡{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}铜语时，铜语失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}层数。

铜语汲取了终焉审判的力量。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。最多叠加3层。
帕斯卡下次命中铜语时，此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率提高10%。当帕斯卡命中铜语时，铜语失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}层数。

languages.text:
ブラスウィスパーはエスカトスのパワーを引き出す。彼女は +10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}と+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。最大3回までスタックする。
パスカルは、次に成功した攻撃においても、彼女に対して+10%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得る。パスカルがブラスウィスパーに攻撃を命中させると、彼女はこの効果のスタックを全て失う。
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text:
ブラスウィスパーはエスカトスのパワーを引き出す。彼女は +10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}と+50%のダメージを得る。最大3回までスタックする。
パスカルは、次に成功した攻撃においても、彼女に対して+10%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}を得る。パスカルがブラスウィスパーに攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させると、彼女はこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のスタックを全て失う。

ブラスウィスパーはエスカトスのパワーを引き出す。彼女は +10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。最大3回までスタックする。
パスカルは、次に成功した攻撃においても、彼女に対して+10%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得る。パスカルがブラスウィスパーに攻撃を命中させると、彼女はこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを全て失う。

languages.text:
Messingflüsterer stärkt sich mit der Macht des Eschatos. Sie erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Kann bis zu 3-mal gestapelt werden.
Pasqal erhält bei seinem nächsten erfolgreichen Angriff außerdem +10 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen sie. Wenn Pasqal Messingflüsterer trifft, verliert sie alle Stapel dieses Effektes.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Brasswhisper stärkt sich mit der Macht des Eschatos. Sie erlangt +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} und +50 % Schaden. Addiert sich bis zu dreimal.
Pasqal erlangt bei seinem nächsten erfolgreichen Angriff gegen sie ebenfalls +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}kritische Trefferchance{/g}. Wenn Pasqal Brasswhisper {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, büßt sie alle Additionen dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} ein.

languages.text:
Murmecuivre puise dans le pouvoir d'Eschatos. Elle bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Cumulable 3 fois.
Pasqal a également +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique lors de sa prochaine attaque. Lorsque Pasqal inflige un coup à Murmecuivre, elle perd tous les cumuls de cet effet.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Brasswhisper puise dans le pouvoir d'Eschatos. Elle bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} et +50 % de dégâts. Cumulable 3 fois.
Pasqal a également +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique à Brasswhisper lors de son attaque réussie suivante. Lorsque Pasqal lui {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}inflige un coup{/g}, Brasswhisper perd tous les cumuls de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.

languages.text:
Pirinçfısıltı, Eskatos'un gücünden yararlanır. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır ve verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%50 artar. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.
Pasqal, ayrıca bir sonraki başarılı saldırısında ona karşı +%10 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Pasqal, Pirinçfısıltı'ya vurduğunda Pirinçfısıltı bu etkinin tüm birikimlerini kaybeder.
languages.original_text:
Brasswhisper draws on the power of Eschatos. She gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.
Pasqal also gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against her on his next successful attack. When Pasqal hits Brasswhisper, she loses all stacks of this effect.
